phrases: Yeah, I know it is not.
But really, your tits have gotten bigger.
You are being kind of creepy.
Do not leave any of your recessive genes behind.
But he looks so much like him.
Look at his lips; see how they are so puffy?
If that is the only criteria, then even the old guy from Abacus Tutor looks like Building Builder.
I want egg soup, egg soup!
It is going to be lumpy.
Stir the egg, stir it, stir it!
Why are you making it for your dad but not for me?
How about you quit that habit of calling everything cute?
Wow, your dad just said the way I talk is cute!
But it is such a great word.
You can use it in any situation.
Do you want an egg in it?
but do not break it apart.
Even your dad likes it that way!
So that is how it is.
I am going to eat too.
Did you get a heatstroke from sitting in the house?
That is cute, but that is also serious!
Jintan's is the biggest one for sure.
All of the stress and trauma I have accumulated until now have become corporeal due to the summer heat...
Even my pubescent sexual urges have been thrown into the mix.
Let us say that you are here as the embodiment of my stress.
why did you appear as a mature version of yourself?
I think I want to have my wish come true.
How can you get a wish fulfilled when you do not even know what it is?!
But I really do get that feeling that is the reason.
For now, just try to remember what your wish was.
It was a wish that could only come true if everyone was together.
But someone is at the door.
What would happen if you opened the door?
I am not exactly worked up.
I feel like there is a weight on my neck.
The teacher asked me to bring you your homework for summer break.
There are only two days of summer break left you know.
Unlike you, I have a lot going on.
Then you should have tossed this away somewhere.
Besides, I do not feel like going to that school for retards any more.
I do not care whether you come to school or not.
But you should be ashamed of yourself.
Why did not you ask her?
Just say,'Let us grant her wish together, Anaru!'
First of all, do not call her Anaru.
Pick either Anjou or Naruko and stick with it.
She is nice to everyone, and has lots of video games and manga.
She is not the Anaru she was back then anymore.
That rotten bitch would not help me even if I asked her.
Anyway, she is not my friend anymore.
I do not like it when you say bad things about Anaru.
Come on, let us go talk to her again!
Now that you have seen Anjou you should understand what it means for your wish.
And it is not just Anjou, everything has changed since back then.
You are wearing a hat and glasses?
Hey, you have a piece of green onion from the ramen stuck to your teeth!
Anaru's house is not this way.
We are taking a walk since we are outside anyway.
Did you see that one movie?
Those guys went to my middle school.
You know, the one with the girl that uses nun-chucks to fight aliens that show up at school.
That is the way it is.
Those grannies really got me worked up,
but no one gives me a second thought.
She does not give a damn about me.
It is not really a surprise.
She is just a hallucination, after all.
This must be, without a doubt, because of my relationship with her...
Did you go to Jin's house?
I only stopped by for a bit.
And it is none of your business.
I wanted you to take them some steamed buns.
Oho, someone is going through puberty.
We are on our way home from summer classes.
We are going to a college-prep high school.
That is the high school uniform
that I was going to wear.
That is not it, I mean...
Are you still talking about that?
Apparently you are not going to school.
You failed the entrance exams and ended up going to a low-tier school around here.
You are not going to school, and you are blurting out Meiko Honma's name.
Is there something wrong with your head?
What are you getting so worked up over?
Even you change when you talk about Meiko Honma.
You are such a pathetic guy.
But you do have your looks going for you.
The one who is changed the most is me.
When I am with you, I remember...
I remember things I do not want to.
We will be the Super Peace Busters!
It is like a group of strong people.
What peace are we going to protect?
The peace here, there, and everywhere!
Then Jintan will be the leader, right?
You like Menma, do not you?
There are not any secrets among the Super Peace Busters.
Say it, say it, say it!
Who would like an ugly girl like...
Because she is such a crybaby.
I am going to see your mom for a bit.
Microwave the food I left you before you eat it.
That smile tore at my heart.
I thought I should just apologize tomorrow.
And dad's got lots of gray hair.
You always offer a bowl to Sis whenever we have curry.
That is because it was her favorite food.
Your sister was a bit of an airhead, so maybe she has not even realized that she died.
What the heck are you doing?
The cup moved on its own.
I did not even do it.
I want egg soup, egg soup!
I conjured Menma up so that I could apologize to her.
If that is the case, then I have to...
The romance lies in the impossibility!
Let us carve our name here.
You have not learned it yet?
Write the radical for'run' to the left...
The time that stopped on that day has started moving again.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
No matter how small the issue, please talk to us!
Wash and dry your hands before you eat.
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
But those are my best memories.
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
I might have hidden shyly behind my bag,
but the truth is, I was really, really happy.
The fireworks blossomed heartrendingly beautiful across the night sky,
and time passed as swiftly as the wind.
We shared so many happy times and trilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
